tasks.title: Math Homework
tasks.description: Complete exercises 1 to 10 on page 23 of the Algebra textbook. Ensure all steps are shown for each problem, and double-check your answers using the answer key provided at the back of the book. Submit your work in a neatly organized notebook.
tasks.subject: Mathematics

tasks.title: Science Project
tasks.description: Build a detailed model of the solar system using materials of your choice (e.g., foam, paper, or 3D printing). Include accurate scaling for planet sizes and distances. Prepare a short presentation explaining the features of each planet and their relative positions.
tasks.subject: Science

tasks.title: History Essay
tasks.description: Write a 1000-word essay on World War II, focusing on the causes, major events, and consequences. Include at least three references from credible sources and ensure proper citation in MLA format. Submit a typed document via email.
tasks.subject: History

tasks.title: Math Quiz Preparation
tasks.description: Review chapters 5-7 from the Geometry textbook. Focus on understanding theorems and solving practice problems. Create a summary sheet of key formulas and concepts to use during the quiz.
tasks.subject: Mathematics

tasks.title: Science Lab Report
tasks.description: Write a detailed lab report based on the chemistry experiment conducted in class. Include sections for introduction, hypothesis, materials, procedure, observations, results, and conclusion. Attach any relevant charts or graphs.
tasks.subject: Science

tasks.title: Historical Timeline
tasks.description: Create a comprehensive timeline of Ancient Egypt, highlighting key events, rulers, and cultural achievements. Use visuals such as images or drawings to enhance the timeline. Submit a digital or physical copy.
